summary: The implementation successfully creates both sitemap.xml and robots.txt files in frontend/public/ with proper formatting and structure. However, there are several missing requirements from REQ-31 regarding specific service detail page URLs and dynamic blog article URLs. Additionally, some implemented service URLs differ from what was specified in the requirements.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include service detail page URL /services/real-estate-law in sitemap.xml
missing_requirements.reason: The sitemap.xml does not include /services/real-estate-law which was explicitly listed in the requirements

missing_requirements.requirement: Include service detail page URL /services/intellectual-property in sitemap.xml
missing_requirements.reason: The sitemap.xml does not include /services/intellectual-property which was explicitly listed in the requirements

missing_requirements.requirement: Include service detail page URL /services/litigation in sitemap.xml
missing_requirements.reason: The sitemap.xml does not include /services/litigation which was explicitly listed in the requirements

missing_requirements.requirement: Blog article URLs dynamically included based on published articles from backend
missing_requirements.reason: The sitemap.xml only includes /blog list page but does not contain any blog detail page URLs using article IDs from backend as required

hallucinated_features.description: Service detail page /services/civil-litigation added to sitemap
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements specified /services/civil-law but implementation includes /services/civil-litigation which was not requested

hallucinated_features.description: Service detail page /services/ip-law added to sitemap
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements specified /services/intellectual-property but implementation includes /services/ip-law which uses a different URL pattern

hallucinated_features.description: Service detail page /services/tax-law added to sitemap
hallucinated_features.reason: Tax law service was not listed in the required service detail pages for REQ-31

hallucinated_features.description: Service detail page /services/startup-law added to sitemap
hallucinated_features.reason: Startup law service was not listed in the required service detail pages for REQ-31

hallucinated_features.description: Service detail page /services/documentation-services added to sitemap
hallucinated_features.reason: Documentation services was not listed in the required service detail pages for REQ-31
